attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment for the killers of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Capital punishment is extreme.
But so is this crime.
No more anonymity for the guilty, only justice for their victim.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
